tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Overall I had a very good experience with my dental treatment. I would highly recommend Perfect Dental care as one-stop for all your dental problems. Few things to highlight:-
a) Easy to get a dental appointment & staff are very professional & punctual in following up with the things.
b) Dr Mahesh is an experienced dentist & sorted out my dental issues & advised appropriately.
C) Team is highly flexible with my appointments & accomadated my requests as I was busy & visited India for holidays .
d) Reasonable & cost-effective, No unnecessary investigations. Team continued my treatment based on my dental summary from my US
e) Overall I saved thousands of dollars but also got the best & appropriate treatment for the dr.
reply_text: Thank you for the kind words Aditya it’s was pleasure treating you in our facility and glad that we could meet your expectations.
